EmailTemplate.description: Email sent to YPs who were previously rejected but passed the assessment after scores were moderated.
EmailTemplate.name: Re-CO Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Step Forward: Important Application Update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Congratulations!
Dear {!Step_Forward_Activity__c.StepFwd_Associate_first_name_confirm__c},
Thank you for attending the Step Forward assessment before Christmas. We wanted to reach out to you as a quality candidate to let you know that we have now had an opportunity to moderate our assessment scores. As such, we are delighted to you let you know we would like to take your application further and make you a conditional offer in the pathway(s) below. Congratulations! {!Step_Forward_Activity__c.Other_Pathways__c} Step Forward is a competitive programme with very limited places and the standard of applicants has been extremely high so well done for reaching this stage of the process. We were impressed with the skills and attributes you demonstrated and are very happy to be able to move you one step closer to an invaluable 12 month paid work placement. There are a number of things you will need to do in order to accept your conditionaloffer and details of this will be sent to you in a separate email. We will also be calling you shortly to discuss your conditional offer and what it means. What happens next?
Accept your conditional offer and confirm you are eligible to be on the programme Complete CV and interview preparation workshop If suitable, we will begin matching you with an Employer The interview process begins
For now, please contact us if you have any questions at step.forward@the-challenge.org or call 020 3542 2404 and we're option 5. You should receive a more detailed email explaining the conditional offer and what you need to do to accept it within the next 7 days. Congratulations! The Step Forward Team
